item.title: Deep Dive: phone addictions; private equity and hospitals
item.description: This week’s featured articles From Harvard Business Review. Do you have a phone addiction? - uhh, probably. Now, do something about it. What happens when hospitals aren’t appropriately funded? They often turn to funding from Private Equity firms. What happens then? It’s not good and costs patients and society.
